answers.answer: You should fast because if you don't your blood sugars will be higher and than you will have to do it again for the 3 hours and that drink is worse than the first one
I didn't have to fast before my test.

question: okay so i know the first time they said i had to fast but im gonna be 28 weeks and 2 days when i go and take the test and i am way hungrier.i get sick now when i dont eat and that liquid that im going to have to drink is going to make me throwup. do i have to fast?
title: gestational diabetes test (fasting?)
